entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 03 March 2023
